page.title: 18 Goodmayes Bungalow estate
page.content: There are lots of terraced and semi detached houses but not many detached ones in the Goodmayes area we surveyed there are many{bungalows}on the right hand side of Goodmayes Lane. Some people call it the "Bungalow Estate". Most houses were built in the early 19OOs. Although many were bombed in World War II, they were rebuilt in the same style. Along Goodmayes Lane and Green Lane there are many{shops}with flats above them. Most houses all look the same with two storeys, three bedrooms often with bay windows at the front, small front{gardens}and larger back gardens. Because there are no garages, people have knocked down their front garden wall to make space for parking their{car. Beverley Brockett, Chadwell Heath High School.
